title: Eric & Ernie's Xmas Show = The Morecambe & Wise Christmas Show
brief_description: A selection of comedy sketches by one of Britain’s favourite TV comedy duos, Eric Morecambe and Ernie Wise, from their Christmas shows. Guests include Peter Barkworth, Peter Cushing, Hannah Gordon, Glenda Jackson, Mick McManus, Gemma Craven, Jill Gascoine, Sir Alec Guinness, Peter Vaughan.
